about_the_game:
Lie down, close your eyes, and listen to the sound of The Forest.
This Official Soundtrack for She and the Light Bearer will bring you back into the magical forest of myths and fairy tales. Accompanied by acoustic guitar, Indonesian ethnic melodies, and melancholic voice.

She and The Light Bearer: Original Soundtrack is brought to you by Pathetic Experience, Masdito Bachtiar, and Christabel Annora.

01 Manah Latu
02 Rikala
03 Gayam
04 Mingkar Mingkuring
05 Gayam (Withered)
06 Memungkur
07 Alang-Alang
08 Gembili
09 Nelangsa
10 Mingkar Mingkuring (Withered)
11 Memungkur (Withered)
12 Witing Wit
13 Memungkur (Corrupted)
14 Mingkar Mingkuring (Corrupted)
15 Gayam (Corrupted)
16 Lelabetan
17 Sarean Pratiwi
18 Cidra
19 Wungu Ayu Bumi
20 Pra-Purna
